name: GameDev Trash
description:
A true AAA experience at an indie price! Why pay extra for unfinished games, with broken code, and lack of optimization when you can get this experience right now at a significantly lower cost - meet GameDev Trash. The game of tomorrow that will show you where the gaming industry is really heading and what awaits you in the future!

The gameplay: Game Dev Trash is highly unconventional. Each level undergoes a genre shift, ranging from first-person shooter to third-person open-world RPG and even horror. Additionally, the game features two unique levels. At the end of each level, players will encounter a boss that represents a different game industry persona, from developer to game producer. All of this is wrapped in a slightly insane plot about the modern game developer and its secrets, narrated by an off-screen voice.
If you enjoy silly jokes and unique gameplay, then this game is perfect for you!

!!CAUTION!!
At the moment, there are 2 out of 5 planned levels in the game. The horror level is still under development, while the next two levels are only in the plans.

Favorite aggressive microtransactions and Day One DLCs - are just jokes. There is no aggressive microtransactions and Day One DLCs in game.
